products.title: Vitra Blackout White Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Vitra Blackout White Roller Blind in White. Made to measure from £7.91 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Refresh your windows with the invigorating white finish and classic design of the Vitra Blackout White Roller Blind. This modern window blind will has a sleek and simple design in radiant white fabric that will help to brighten and open up your space. When you require solace and privacy, the blackout backing provides an effective screen to the outside world.
 
 Product ID: SDB-RBX0525 Fabric Colour: White Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Vitra Blackout White Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra
products.metadescription: Vitra Blackout White Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra in White. Made to measure from £38.98 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Vitra Blackout is one of our most popular blackout fabrics.  In several fresh, bright shades, this fabric is a  great way for you to upgrade your skylight window at a value cost. 
 
This option comes with sleek, modern Aluminium framework. 
 
This blackout fabric has a colour match backing and provides up to 20% heat loss reduction.
 
 Product ID: DB-SRB0001 Fabric Colour: White Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample     Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Vitra White (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Vitra White (Blackout) Blackout Vertical Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Blackout Vertical Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 250mm Max Width: 4115mm
 	Min Drop: 300mm Max Drop: 2913mm
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Louvre Width: 89mm
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
 	Controls: Cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres.
 	Stack: A choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: Louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.

products.title: Vitra Blackout White Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Vitra Blackout White Electric Roller Blind in White. Made to measure from £123.62 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Vitra Blackout is one of our most popular ranges available in a variety of vibrant colours at an affordable price. 
 Revamp your home or office space with a stunning Vitra Blackout White roller blind. The electric feature makes it easy to use and ideal for windows that are difficult to reach.
